title: Tom Gates: (A Tiny Bit) Lucky
description: Tom's dad wants to make a kite so they can go out together and get some fresh air. This would be okay with Tom if he had a dog, but thats just not going to happen. Toms grumpy sister Delia is allergic to dogs!Tom has other things on his mind. The Rock Weekly Band Battle Audition is coming up, and Tom, Derek and Norman need some SERIOUS band practice. But Toms not panicking because they have loads of time . . . time that passes quickly . . . time that runs out!Will Tom and his friends pull it together in time for the audition?
author: Liz Pichon
